descriptor.name: Axe Men's Grooming Kit (Travel Bag Free)
descriptor.short_desc: About this product • Axe presents a brand-new innovation in the men’s grooming range, the Axe grooming kit! Built to keep you ready on the go, this stylish, portable kit contains all the essentials a ...
descriptor.long_desc: About this product • Axe presents a brand-new innovation in the men’s grooming range, the Axe grooming kit! Built to keep you ready on the go, this stylish, portable kit contains all the essentials a man on the move needs. The kit includes the Axe Signature Body Perfume Mysterious (122ml), Axe Dark Temptation Deodorant Body Spray Can (150ml), the AXE Signature Denim After Shave Lotion (50ml) and Axe Signature Denim Shaving Cream (78g)  • AXE Dark Temptation Deodorant 150 ml: Start your day with the Iconic Axe Dark Temptation Deodorant designed to make you ‘As Irresistible As Chocolate’. Enriched by the mischievous interplay of unique seductive ingredients, this long-lasting fragrance has been crafted for a refreshing beat in Axe's iconic style.  • AXE Signature Mysterious Body Perfume 122 ml: Made for the urban metrosexual man this perfume combines a hint of zesty citrus and a mild note of woody musk to give you a super enticing fragrance that lasts all day long with 3 times more perfume in every drop*  • AXE Denim After Shave Lotion 50 ml: For the man who doesn’t have to try too hard. Who likes to play it smooth. Axe Signature Denim After Shave Lotion is made just for you. This calming lotion helps amplify a smooth shave and leaves your skin feeling soft and fresh. A spicy, rich, masculine cologne scent with bursts of citrus gives you a day long fresh feeling .Start your day with Axe Denim Shaving Cream and complete your morning shave with Axe Signature Denim After Shave Lotion  •  AXE Denim Lather Shaving Cream 78 g: The Axe Denim Shaving Cream is rich, creamy lather enriched with moisturisers that tames the toughest stubble, leaving your skin smooth and irresistible to touch. It’s enriched with citrusy swirls for a spicy masculine scent. Just squeeze the tube to get the needed Axe Denim shaving cream on your shaving brush, lather with water and get the closest smooth shave possible. It is completely safe on your skin.  Other Information • Marketer Name and Address: Hindustan Unilever Ltd, Unilever House, B D Sawant Marg, Chakala Andheri East - 400099  • Country Of Origin: India  • Best Before: **24 Months (From date of Manufacturing)

descriptor.name: Axe Recharge Midnight and 24x7 Long Lasting Deodorant Bodyspray For Men
descriptor.short_desc: About this product • Axe brings you a pack of 2 body sprays specially crafted from a wide range of sprays by AXE, the world’s #1 male deodorant brand.  • You can now stay fresh all day with the 24-hou...
descriptor.long_desc: About this product • Axe brings you a pack of 2 body sprays specially crafted from a wide range of sprays by AXE, the world’s #1 male deodorant brand.  • You can now stay fresh all day with the 24-hour long-lasting fragrance. Spend the entire day smelling irresistible, just the way you are meant to be.  • This carefully curated pack of two AXE body sprays is made for the guy who’s on the move all day long! The pack contains one bottle of AXE Midnight Sparkling Fruity Fragrance body spray for men whose notes of Lemon, Pineapple, and Gaaic wood are sure to keep you going all night long, and one bottle of AXE 24X7 Non-Stop Woody Fragrance deodorant for men infused with sparkling top notes and a long-lasting woody undertone that keeps you smelling exceptionally fresh all day long.  • Let your mood decide your fragrance every morning, and take the day head on, knowing that the long-lasting deo spray you chose will keep you fresh throughout.  •  Check out the complete range of AXE grooming products, including the AXE Signature range of body perfumes, AXE Ticket range of pocket perfumes, AXE shaving creams, AXE after shave lotions, gift combo packs, deodorants for men combo packs, etc. Tell us more about your favourite products by leaving us a review." Other Information • Marketer Name and Address: Hindustan Unilever Limited, Unilever House, B D Sawant Marg, Chakala Andheri East - 400099  • Country Of Origin: India  • Best Before: **36 Months(From date of Manufacturing)

descriptor.name: Axe Dark Temptation (Pack Of 2) And Pulse Long-Lasting Deodorant for Men( 3 Items In The Set )
descriptor.short_desc: About this product •  AXE always has the right fragrance to complete your grooming routine.  •  And, with a wide range of long-lasting body sprays, you can never settle for just one! That’s why AXE br...
descriptor.long_desc: About this product •  AXE always has the right fragrance to complete your grooming routine.  •  And, with a wide range of long-lasting body sprays, you can never settle for just one! That’s why AXE brings you a combo of irresistible long lasting Bodyspray Deodorant so that you can smell fresh for entire day at great value  •  Hold on, there’s more! Each body spray in this combo is formulated with a unique Dual Action* Technology that gives you 48-hour odour protection.  •  Catch up with your new wingman today and choose your combo of long-lasting fragrances.  •  AXE Gold Temptation body spray x 2 (150 ml each pack): Take in the invigorating notes of exotic spice that leaves you smelling fresh and earthy. Made with no parabens or dyes, cool your body by 6 degrees instantly and stay fresh all day.  •  AXE Dark Temptation by spray (150 ml): Relish the tempting fragrance of smooth chocolate paired with rich, spicy notes of Amber and Peppercorn. Cool yourself by 6 degrees with this paraben-free body spray and simply enjoy the pleasure that chocolate holds.  •  *Refers to new Zinc technology (patent applied) providing Dual Action of preventing odour formation and absorption of existing odour causing molecules  How to use  • Step 1: Hold the can straight up about 15cms away from your body.  • Step 2: Spray on chest, neck, underarms and other pulse points so that the scent lingers through the day. Other Information • Marketer Name and Address: Hindustan Unilever Limited, Unilever House, B D Sawant Marg, Chakala Andheri East - 400099  • Country Of Origin: India  • Best Before: **36 Months(From date of Manufacturing)

descriptor.name: Axe Chocolate Collection Gift For Men
descriptor.short_desc: About this product • The World’s No. 1 Male Deodorant – Axe, brings you the Axe Chocolate Collection for men. This gift set for men is part of our 10 year anniversary celebration for the irresistible ...
descriptor.long_desc: About this product • The World’s No. 1 Male Deodorant – Axe, brings you the Axe Chocolate Collection for men. This gift set for men is part of our 10 year anniversary celebration for the irresistible Dark Temptation fragrance. The Axe Temptation After Shave Lotion is the perfect finish to your morning shave. It soothes nicks and cuts and leaves your skin feeling soft and moisturised. While the intoxicating fragrance stimulates your senses and energises you. Just splash some Axe Temptation After Shave lotion on your hands and gently dab on your cheeks for a refreshing after shave experience. The Axe Dark Temptation Body Spray will instantly cool you down by 6-degrees! Powered by the unique intense notes of Dark Chocolate, this is the ideal body spray to kickstart your busy day. Just twist the cap to reveal the nozzle. Then, hold the can straight up, and spray 15cms away from your body. Axe Dark Temptation Body Spray is safe to use on your skin, so spray on your underarms and across your chest and you’re ready to go! The Axe Signature Dark Temptation no gas Body Deodorant for men has a rich chocolate fragrance that lasts 24 hours. With notes of Amber and Peppercorn added to a smooth chocolate-scented base, this men's deo will help you make an unforgettable impression when it matters most. Hold the can straight up, about 15cms away from your body, and spray on your chest and neck. It’s that simple and totally safe on skin! Treat your loved one to some chocolate goodness with this attractive gift set of Axe Signature Dark Temptation Signature no gas Body Deodorant, Axe Dark Temptation Body Spray and Axe Temptation After Shave Lotion.  Other Information • Marketer Name and Address: Hindustan Unilever Ltd, Unilever House, B D Sawant Marg, Chakala Andheri East - 400099  • Country Of Origin: India  • Best Before: **36 Months (From date of Manufacturing)

descriptor.name: Axe Body Spray Perfume for Men, Signature Intense & Dark Temptation 154 ml (Pack Of 2)
descriptor.short_desc: About this product • The World’s # 1 Male Deodorant, Axe presents ‘Axe Signature’ - a range of premium body perfumes with 0% gas. •  This combo pack contains one unit of Axe Signature Intense body per...
descriptor.long_desc: About this product • The World’s # 1 Male Deodorant, Axe presents ‘Axe Signature’ - a range of premium body perfumes with 0% gas. •  This combo pack contains one unit of Axe Signature Intense body perfume - A strong and long-lasting woody fragrance with a subtle hint of vanilla and green hazelnut.  • These body perfumes are not only stronger, they also last longer, helping you make an unforgettable impression when it matters the most.  •  The sensual and bold aroma giving you long-lasting, all day freshness.  •  Suitable for both work and play, this perfume will ensure you always make a bold statement, and one unit of Axe Signature Dark Temptation - Enriched by the mischievous interplay of unique seductive ingredients, this long-lasting fragrance has been crafted for a refreshing beat in Axe's iconic style.  •  Powered by the unique intense fragrance of dark chocolate that leans toward seductive bliss, this body perfume has been designed for the metrosexual man.  • Check out the complete range of Axe products including Axe Deodorants, Axe Ticket range of pocket perfumes, Axe shaving creams, Axe after shave lotions etc. and tell us more about your favourite products by leaving us a review.  Storage Direction (e.g. Condition)  • "Keep it in a cool place away from heat or sunlight. Do not expose it to temperature exceeding 50 degrees Celsius.  How to use • Step 1: Hold can upright and close to your body.  • Step 2: Spray all over.  Other Information • Marketer Name and Address: Hindustan Unilever Ltd, Unilever House, B D Sawant Marg, Chakala Andheri East - 400099  • Country Of Origin: India  • Best Before: **24 Months (From date of Manufacturing)

descriptor.name: Axe Signature Mysterious long Lasting No Gas Body Deodorant For Men 154ml
descriptor.short_desc: About this product • Introducing Signature Mysterious Deodorants by Axe – the World’s #1 Male Deodorant brand. AXE offers a wide range of long-lasting fragrances that’s a perfect addition to any man’s...
descriptor.long_desc: About this product • Introducing Signature Mysterious Deodorants by Axe – the World’s #1 Male Deodorant brand. AXE offers a wide range of long-lasting fragrances that’s a perfect addition to any man’s daily grooming regime. These non-gas perfumes are formulated with 48HR Dual Action Technology that keeps you smelling great, feeling fresh and has a lasting odour-protection. So, now you know why Axe is the perfect pick for your daily grooming needs. There’s something irresistible about the men who are mysterious; their secrecy is magnetic, attracting curious explorers to try and uncover what lies beneath. With notes of Sage, Patchouli, Green Apple and Marine, Axe Signature Mysterious long-lasting deo for men also has 0% gas, lending to the fresh feel of the product. To use, hold the can straight up about 15cms away from your body. Spray behind the ears, and other pulse points so that the scent lingers on. See, it’s just that easy and effortless to smell ready. Axe’s long-lasting deos boast a New Zinc formula that enhances odour protection. Furthermore, they’re also absolutely safe to spray directly onto the skin as they’re made with no parabens or dyes. Scent that ranges from smooth to exotic to fresh, with the new range of Axe deodorants for men, you get the best ever wingman there is. Pick between AXE Intense, Dark Temptation, Gold Temptation, Champion, and many more. Choose yours now!!!"  Other Information • Marketer Name and Address: Hindustan Unilever Ltd, Unilever House, B D Sawant Marg, Chakala Andheri East - 400099  • Country Of Origin: India  • Best Before: **36 Months (From date of Manufacturing)

descriptor.name: Lit from within
descriptor.short_desc:
About this product
This kit includes, Lakme Absolute Argan Oil Radiance Night Revival Eye Cream 15 g, Lakme Absolute Argan Oil Radiance Oil-In Gel 50 g, Lakme Absolute Argan Oil Radiance Overnight Oil...
descriptor.long_desc:
About this product
This kit includes, Lakme Absolute Argan Oil Radiance Night Revival Eye Cream 15 g, Lakme Absolute Argan Oil Radiance Oil-In Gel 50 g, Lakme Absolute Argan Oil Radiance Overnight Oil-in-Serum 15ml and Free Lakmé Jade Roller.
• "Meet the range of luxurious face care products from the house of Lakme. This range of skincare products is infused with legendary Moroccon Argan oil, which is known to provide superior nourishment.Introducing the New Lakme Absolute Argan Oil Radiance Night Revival Eye Crème. Infused with Moroccan Argan oil & Opti Glow Complex, this non greasy and non sticky formula, instantly absorbs into your skin and helps reduce dark circles, dullness to give you a bright look. Massaging relaxes eyes.
How to use: Gently open the cap. Squeeze out the creme on to applicator head. Dot the creme under the eye. Massage gently. Lightly pat the excess creme.For optimum results, experience the goodness of Argan with the Lame Absolute Argan Oil Radiance Skincare Range. It consists of: 1. The Oil-in- crème SPF 30, a day crème infused with the goodness of Argan oil, designed to nourish and revitalize your skin while protecting your skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays. 2. The Overnight Oil-in-Serum, A lightweight yet efficacious serum, infused with the goodness of Argan Oil, it should be applied at night before bedtime and it soaks into your skin, so you wake up to nourished skin with a radiant glow. Try now at a Lakme Store near you!" •  "Introducing the New Lakme Absolute Argan Oil Radiance Oil-in-Gel, An ultra-lightweight gel formulation infused with Moroccan Argan oil which is known as a superior nourishing ingredient. Experience the goodness of Argan now in a gel crème format, designed to keep your skin hydrated through the summer heat. This non-greasy and non-sticky formula instantly absorbs into your skin to leave it feeling soft and nourished with a radiant look.It is suitable for all skin types and can be used in all weather conditions. Gently apply the gel crème onto your face and massage in circular movements, starting from the centre to contours of your cleansed face. For best results use every morning and evening. In the unlikely event of skin irritation/discomfort, discontinue the use of product and consult with a doctor at the earliest.For optimum results, experience the goodness of Argan with the Lame Absolute Argan Oil Radiance Skincare Range. It consists of: 1. The Oil-in- crème SPF 30, a day crème infused with the goodness of Argan oil, designed to nourish and revitalize your skin while protecting your skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays. 2. The Overnight Oil-in-Serum, A lightweight yet efficacious serum, infused with the goodness of Argan Oil, it should be applied at night before bedtime and it soaks into your skin, so you wake up to nourished skin with a radiant glow. Try now at a Lakme Store near you!" • "Meet the new range of luxurious face care products from the house of Lakme. This range of skincare products is infused with legendary Moroccon Argan oil, which is known to provide superior nourishment. This lightweight concentrate combines the power of a serum with the nourishment of oil."
Other Information • Marketer Name and Address: Hindustan Unilever Ltd, Unilever House, B D Sawant Marg, Chakala Andheri East - 400099  • Country Of Origin: India

descriptor.name: AXE Ultra Smooth After Shave Balm, 100 g
descriptor.short_desc: About this product • The World’s # 1 Male Deodorant Axe brings you the all new Axe shave range! Ignoring your super important post shave care? Not anymore! The all new Axe Ultrasmooth Aftershave Balm ...
descriptor.long_desc:
About this product • The World’s # 1 Male Deodorant Axe brings you the all new Axe shave range! Ignoring your super important post shave care? Not anymore! The all new Axe Ultrasmooth Aftershave Balm is here to bring about your after-shave calm. Infused with Glycerine and Antioxidants, this unique formulation moisturizes your skin, giving it the much-needed hydration after every shave. Get in on the secrets of a great shave regime for that oh-so-smooth feeling that helps you get closer. Not sure on how to use after shave balm? It’s easy. Just rinse your face thoroughly after shaving, pat down with a towel to dry, dispense the required amount of aftershave balm on to your palm, and apply evenly on your face. Massaging your face in circular motions while applying the balm may help the balm seep into your skin better for that ultra-slick, ultra-smooth feeling. The Axe Ultrasmooth After Shave Balm helps alleviate razor burns and makes your skin feel so much better post-shave. So, are you ready to up your shave game? Quick Tip: top up your Axe Ultrasmooth Shaving Balm with the all new Axe Ultrasmooth Shaving Foam and build the ultimate shave regime for the best results. " • Protects skin from irritation due to razor burns and cuts • Spreads easily on application • Leaves the skin feeling smooth and moisturized post shave • Contains hydrating glycerine to keep your skin moisturized • Contains anti-oxidants • Use post each shave for best results  Storage Direction (e.g. Condition)  • Store in a cool & dark place.  How to use • Step 1: Post Shave, dry your face • Step 2: Press Nozzle to release balm on your Palm • Step 3: Apply evenly to spread over Shaved area• Step 4: Do not rinse."
Other Information • Marketer Name and Address: Hindustan Unilever Limited, Unilever House, B D Sawant Marg, Chakala Andheri East - 400099  • Country Of Origin: India  • Best Before: **36 Months(From date of Manufacturing)

descriptor.name: Axe Pulse Long Lasting Deodorant Bodyspray For Men 150ml
descriptor.short_desc: About this product •  "Introducing Pulse Deodorant by Axe – the World’s #1 Male Deodorant brand. AXE offers a wide range of long-lasting fragrances, the perfect addition to any man’s grooming regime. ...
descriptor.long_desc: About this product •  "Introducing Pulse Deodorant by Axe – the World’s #1 Male Deodorant brand. AXE offers a wide range of long-lasting fragrances, the perfect addition to any man’s grooming regime. These deodorants for men are formulated with 48HR Dual Action Technology that keeps you smelling great, feeling fresh and has a lasting odour-protection. So, now you know why Axe is the perfect pick for your daily grooming needs. A citrus fragrance enhanced with hints of Patchouli, Bergamot and more; it’s zesty properties energize you, so you can feel fresh while keeping up with your busy day. The Axe Pulse long-lasting deo for men gets you used to the best. What’s more is its instant cooling effect, lending to the fresh feel of the product. Just twist the cap to reveal the nozzle. Then, hold the can straight up about 15cms away from your body. Spray on your Underarms and Chest. See, it’s just that easy and effortless to be smell ready. Axe’s long-lasting deos boast a New Zinc formula that enhances odour protection. Furthermore, they’re also absolutely safe to spray directly onto the skin as they’re made with no parabens or dyes. Feel the Pulse racing, with the new range of Axe deodorants for men, you get the best ever wingman there is. Pick between AXE Ice Chill, 24x7, Midnight and many more. Choose yours now!!!"  Other Information • Marketer Name and Address: Hindustan Unilever Ltd, Unilever House, B D Sawant Marg, Chakala Andheri East - 400099  • Country Of Origin: India  • Best Before: **36 Months (From date of Manufacturing)

descriptor.name: Axe Signature Gold Temptation, No Gas Body Deodorant For Men, 154ml
descriptor.short_desc: About this product •  "Introducing the Signature Gold Temptation, No Gas Body Deodorant by Axe– the World’s #1 Male Deodorant brand. With a wide range of body deodorants and male grooming products, Ax...
descriptor.long_desc: About this product •  "Introducing the Signature Gold Temptation, No Gas Body Deodorant by Axe– the World’s #1 Male Deodorant brand. With a wide range of body deodorants and male grooming products, Axe is your wingman for all your daily grooming needs. Make special occasions extraordinary with the new Axe Gold Temptation No Gas Body Deodorant for men. For those who want only the best of everything, this body deodorant has been made just for you. Crafted with exotic nutmeg, praline and musk, the spicy Axe Gold Temptation No Gas Body Deodorant is the perfect fragrance for you as you experience the luxurious finer moments of life. Hold the can straight up about 15cms away from your body, and spray. It’s simple! You don't need to get worked up about using it on your body because it’s totally safe to spray the Axe Gold Temptation No Gas Body Deodorant directly onto your skin. With scents that range from smooth to exotic to fresh, get the best ever wingman there is with the Axe Gold Temptation No Gas Body Deodorant for men. Pick between unique fragrances such as Corporate, Rogue, Suave, Mysterious, Maverick and many more. What are you waiting for? Choose your Signature now!"  •  Exotic spiced fragrance  •  24 hour, long lasting fragrance  •  Safe on skin  •  From The World’s No. 1 Male Deodorant  •  Check out the entire, Axe Signature range of 0% gas body deodorants.   Storage Direction (e.g. Condition)  • Do not expose to temperatures exceeding 50⁰ C. Keep in cool place away from heat and sunlight.    How to use • Step 1: Hold Can upright and close to your skin  • Step 2: Spray liberally on your body and clothes. Other Information • Marketer Name and Address: Hindustan Unilever Limited, Unilever House, B D Sawant Marg, Chakala Andheri East - 400099  • Country Of Origin: India  • Best Before: **36 Months(From date of Manufacturing)

descriptor.name: Axe Ice Chill Shaving Foam, 193 g
descriptor.short_desc: About this product •  The World’s # 1 Male Deodorant Axe brings you the all new Axe shave range! Kick start your day with the icy cool freshness that you need to break the ice with everyone you meet! ...
descriptor.long_desc: About this product •  The World’s # 1 Male Deodorant Axe brings you the all new Axe shave range! Kick start your day with the icy cool freshness that you need to break the ice with everyone you meet! With the all new Axe Ice Chill Shaving foam infused with fresh Patchouli, Aqua fragrance and Menthol to keep you feeling refreshed. Worried about dry burns, nicks and cuts? Not anymore! The Axe Ice Chill Shaving Foam calms and moisturizes your skin for a great shaving experience. Got sensitive skin? We’ve got your back. Just dispense the necessary amount of Axe Ice Chill Shaving Foam onto your fingertips, apply the foam on your face, and shave as usual. Don’t get stuck with regular shaving gel or shaving cream, It’s time to upgrade! What makes shaving foam considerably better than shaving gel or shaving cream is its light lather and ease of rinsing, saving you the much-needed time and effort every morning. Let’s not forget the icy chill feels with the Axe Ice Chill Shaving Foam. Remember, You’re hotter when you’re chill! Top up your Axe Ice Chill Shaving Foam with the all new Axe Ultrasmooth Shaving Balm and build the ultimate shave regime.  •  Great lathering for a smooth, irritation free shaving experience  •  Reduces risk of dry burns  •  Contains Aloe that helps moisturize skin  •  Menthol adds a soothing, icy cool sensation to your shave  •  Fresh Patchouli & Aqua fragrance help you feel refreshed  •  Kick start your day like a chiller. Remember you're hotter when you chill!   Storage Direction (e.g. Condition)  • Protect from sunlight. Do not expose to temperatures exceeding 50°C. Keep away from heat, hot surfaces, sparks, open flames and other ignition sources.   How to use • Step 1: Hold Can upright & shake well  • Step 2: Splash water on your face  • Step 3: Press nozzle to release foam in your hand Other Information • Marketer Name and Address: Hindustan Unilever Limited, Unilever House, B D Sawant Marg, Chakala Andheri East - 400099  • Country Of Origin: India  • Best Before: **36 Months(From date of Manufacturing)

descriptor.name: Axe Invisible Shaving Gel, 100 g
descriptor.short_desc: About this product • Want that perfect beard? Scared every time you shave because you shaved off more than you intended to, more than once? Well not anymore because The World’s # 1 Male Deodorant Axe ...
descriptor.long_desc: About this product • Want that perfect beard? Scared every time you shave because you shaved off more than you intended to, more than once? Well not anymore because The World’s # 1 Male Deodorant Axe brings you the all new Axe Invisible Shave Gel. An innovative new product with 0% foam, which means you can see where you shave! Those beard lines? Not a problem anymore. Just dispense this transparent gel on to your fingertips and apply along the beard lines which will be clearly visible to you unlike when you apply regular shave gel, shaving cream or shaving foam. Once done, shave confidently along the beard lines with full visibility of how much you’re shaving off. Rinse your face and voila! You have the perfectly shaped and styled beard. It’s peppermint burst help’s you kick start the day with a jolt of freshness gearing you up for a great day ahead. Want to experiment with A slick goatee? A moustache-only look? Or even a clean shave with sideburns? Go right ahead! This acne safe, moisturizing gel has your back. Top it up with the Axe Ultra Smooth Post Shave Balm for that oh-so-sexy post shave feel and build the ultimate shave regime. • A unique shaving gel that creates 0%   foam • Completely transparent so you can see where you are shaving  • Helps craft and shape your beard • Enriched with moisturizing Aloe Vera • Fresh peppermint helps you feel refreshed • Spreads easily on application   Storage Direction (e.g. Condition)  • Store in a cool & dark place.   How to use • Step 1: Wet your face with water • Step 2: Press and release nozzle and take the gel on your fingers • Step 3: See where you want to shave and apply gel evenly• Step 4: Rinse off after shaving.Other Information • Marketer Name and Address: Hindustan Unilever Limited, Unilever House, B D Sawant Marg, Chakala Andheri East - 400099  • Country Of Origin: India  • Best Before: **36 Months(From date of Manufacturing)

descriptor.name: Axe Ultra Smooth Shaving Foam, 193 g
descriptor.short_desc: About this product • The World’s # 1 Male Deodorant Axe brings you the all new Axe shave range! Known worldwide for its uber-cool, young, and sexy approach to men’s grooming products, Axe brings you t...
descriptor.long_desc: About this product • The World’s # 1 Male Deodorant Axe brings you the all new Axe shave range! Known worldwide for its uber-cool, young, and sexy approach to men’s grooming products, Axe brings you this super slick, super smooth shaving foam that will replace your shaving gel or cream. Don’t believe us? Give it a shot and get ready to put your best look on every morning with the all new Axe Ultrasmooth Shaving Foam! Filled with soothing Aloe Vera, moisturisers that help condition the skin and a refreshing citrus fragrance The Axe Ultrasmooth Shaving Foam reduces the risk of burns, nicks and cuts caused during shaving. Why is shaving foam better than shaving gel or cream? Shaving foam provides light lather that is airy on the skin, and very easy to rinse off as opposed to a shave gel or cream and hence is much easier to use. Just dispense the required amount of foam on your fingertips, apply the foam on your face, and shave as usual to get a super smooth, super slick shave in no time! Top up your Axe Ultrasmooth Shaving Foam with the all new Axe Ultrasmooth Shaving Balm and build the ultimate shave regime. • Great lathering for smooth, irritation free shaving experience •  Reduces risk of dry burns  • Get a clean, stubble free shave • Contains soothing Aloe Vera to keep your skin moisturized • Citrus fragrance to help you feel refreshed • Be the smoothest gut in the room with a clean smooth shave!  Storage Direction (e.g. Condition)  • Protect from sunlight. Do not expose to temperatures exceeding 50°C. Keep away from heat, hot surfaces, sparks, open flames and other ignition sources.   How to use • Step 1: Hold Can upright & shake well • Step 2: Splash water on your face  • Step 3: Press nozzle to release foam in your hand• Step 4: Apply evenly on beard• Step 5: Shave as usual• Step 6: Rinse off after shaving.Other Information • Marketer Name and Address: Hindustan Unilever Limited, Unilever House, B D Sawant Marg, Chakala Andheri East - 400099  • Country Of Origin: India  • Best Before: **36 Months(From date of Manufacturing)

descriptor.name: Axe Signature Denim After Shave Lotion 100 ml
descriptor.short_desc: About this product • For the man who doesn’t have to try too hard. Who likes to play it smooth. Axe Signature Denim After Shave Lotion is made just for you. This calming lotion helps amplify a smooth ...
descriptor.long_desc:
About this product • For the man who doesn’t have to try too hard. Who likes to play it smooth. Axe Signature Denim After Shave Lotion is made just for you. This calming lotion helps amplify a smooth shave and leaves your skin feeling soft and fresh. A spicy, rich, masculine cologne scent with bursts of citrus gives you a day long fresh feeling. • Axe Signature After Shave Lotion for men. • Spicy, rich masculine cologne scent with bursts of fresh citrus. • Stimulates your senses. • Keeps your skin fresh and clean. • Amplifies a smooth shave.• Day long effect, safe on skin.
Other Information • Marketer Name and Address: Hindustan Unilever Ltd, Unilever House, B D Sawant Marg, Chakala Andheri East - 400099  • Country Of Origin: India  • Best Before: **24 Months (From date of Manufacturing)

descriptor.name: Lakme Absolute Argan Oil Radiance Night Revival Eye Cream 15 g
descriptor.short_desc: About this product • "Meet the range of luxurious face care products from the house of Lakme. This range of skincare products is infused with legendary Moroccon Argan oil, which is known to provide su...
descriptor.long_desc:
About this product • "Meet the range of luxurious face care products from the house of Lakme. This range of skincare products is infused with legendary Moroccon Argan oil, which is known to provide superior nourishment.Introducing the New Lakme Absolute Argan Oil Radiance Night Revival Eye Crème. Infused with Moroccan Argan oil & Opti Glow Complex, this non greasy and non sticky formula, instantly absorbs into your skin and helps reduce dark circles, dullness to give you a bright look. Massaging relaxes eyes.How to use: Gently open the cap. Squeeze out the creme on to applicator head. Dot the creme under the eye. Massage gently. Lightly pat the excess creme.For optimum results, experience the goodness of Argan with the Lame Absolute Argan Oil Radiance Skincare Range. It consists of: 1. The Oil-in- crème SPF 30, a day crème infused with the goodness of Argan oil, designed to nourish and revitalize your skin while protecting your skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays. 2. The Overnight Oil-in-Serum, A lightweight yet efficacious serum, infused with the goodness of Argan Oil, it should be applied at night before bedtime and it soaks into your skin, so you wake up to nourished skin with a radiant glow. Try now at a Lakme Store near you!" • Refreshes Tired Looking Eyes. • Reduces Dark Circles, dullness to give you a bright look • Hydrates skin to give it a radiant look • Goodness Of Moroccan Argan Oil & Opti B Complex • Non greasy and Non sticky 
Other Information • Marketer Name and Address: Hindustan Unilever Ltd, Unilever House, B D Sawant Marg, Chakala Andheri East - 400099  • Country Of Origin: India  • Best Before: **36 Months (From date of Manufacturing)

descriptor.name: Love Beauty & Planet Natural Argan Oil & Lavender Smoothening Conditioner, Relaxes Frizzy, Dry & Curly Hair, No Parabens, No Silicones, 400ml
descriptor.short_desc: About this product • Calm your frizz for hair that's oh so smooth with our Smooth and Serene Conditioner! Our anti frizz conditioner is made with plant based cleansers and infused with organic coconut...
descriptor.long_desc:
About this product • Calm your frizz for hair that's oh so smooth with our Smooth and Serene Conditioner! Our anti frizz conditioner is made with plant based cleansers and infused with organic coconut oil. Our fast-rinse conditioner technology saves you from tangles and can help you save water. Delicately surround your hair in a cloud of heirloom French Lavender, sourced ethically from the Drôme Provençale Region of France. How to use? After shampooing, spread through your gorgeous wet locks. Avoid the roots, rinse. Go easy on the tap! For brilliantly beautiful hair, try our line of frizz control hair products, start with our Love Beauty and Planet Argan Oil & Lavender Smooth and Serene Shampoo. At Love Beauty and Planet we are committed to acts of love that make you and our planet a little more beautiful, everyday. Our goal is a carbon footprint so small it's like we weren't even here. We started our journey by loading our beauty products with goodness. Every one of our bottles is made from 100% recycled materials and are recyclable. Our caps and pumps aren’t made from recycled plastics yet, but we’re working on it. No Silicones, No Parabens. Yes vegan, Yes Peta certified cruelty free. Other Information • 
Marketer Name and Address: Lotus Beauty Care Pvt LTD,L.B.C.P, Unit 2 ,Haridwar 249 403,Uttarakhand, M.L. No M 16/C/UA/2010
 • Country Of Origin: India 
 • Best Before: **24 Months(From date of Manufacturing)
